titles.title: Wounded Warrior Bill of Rights Act of 2021
Wounded Warrior Bill of Rights Act of 2021
To clarify and improve accountability for certain members of the Armed Forces during consideration by a medical evaluation board, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Wounded Warrior Bill of Rights Act of 2021
This bill requires each military department to maintain authority over and responsibility for any of member of the Armed Forces under the jurisdiction of the military department concerned while a medical evaluation board is considering the member.
